name: The Dragon Gate
description:
The Dragon Gate, or Longmen, embodies many of the core philosophies of ancient Chinese mythology: Overcome challenge and mediocrity, and you will become something greater.


All art and graphics used from Dream by WOMBO.

Title: The Dragon Gate

Platform: HTML

Genre: Choose-Your-Own-Adventure

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: As a carp, you have a decision to make! Pursue your legendary destiny? Or the safety of mediocrity?

Instructions: Download the HTML file for more information

Game Design Team

Haiying Zeng– Game Designer
